Add design specification

Source: R/fn_add.R
add_design_spec.Rd

add_design_spec() is an Add function that updates an object by adding data to that object. Specifically, this function implements an algorithm to add design specification. Function argument dce_design_ls specifies the object to be updated. The function returns Discrete choice experiment design (a list).

Usage

add_design_spec(
  dce_design_ls = list(),
  add_choice_cards_1L_lgl = F,
  add_cndt_design_mat = F,
  alternatives_chr = character(0),
  att_lvls_tb = tibble::tibble(),
  block_idxs_ls = list(),
  choice_var_pfx_1L_chr = "DCE_B",
  constraints_ls = list(),
  cost_att_idx_1L_int = integer(0),
  cost_pfx_1L_chr = "",
  cost_sfx_1L_chr = "",
  draws_1L_int = 10L,
  nbr_of_blocks_1L_int = integer(0),
  nbr_of_sets_1L_int = integer(0),
  opt_out_idx_1L_int = integer(0),
  parallel_1L_lgl = FALSE,
  pilot_ds_tb = NULL,
  priors_dbl = numeric(0),
  priors_idx_1L_int = integer(0),
  seed_1L_int = 1987,
  session_ls = list(),
  set_idx_1L_int = integer(0),
  transform_att_nms_1L_lgl = T
)

Arguments

dce_design_ls

Discrete choice experiment design (a list), Default: list()

add_choice_cards_1L_lgl

Add choice cards (a logical vector of length one), Default: F

add_cndt_design_mat

Add candidate design (a matrix), Default: F

alternatives_chr

Alternatives (a character vector), Default: character(0)

att_lvls_tb

Attribute levels (a tibble), Default: tibble::tibble()

block_idxs_ls

Block indices (a list), Default: list()

choice_var_pfx_1L_chr

Choice variable prefix (a character vector of length one), Default: 'DCE_B'

constraints_ls

Constraints (a list), Default: list()

cost_att_idx_1L_int

Cost attribute index (an integer vector of length one), Default: integer(0)

cost_pfx_1L_chr

Cost prefix (a character vector of length one), Default: ''

cost_sfx_1L_chr

Cost suffix (a character vector of length one), Default: ''

draws_1L_int

Draws (an integer vector of length one), Default: 10

nbr_of_blocks_1L_int

Number of blocks (an integer vector of length one), Default: integer(0)

nbr_of_sets_1L_int

Number of sets (an integer vector of length one), Default: integer(0)

opt_out_idx_1L_int

Opt out index (an integer vector of length one), Default: integer(0)

parallel_1L_lgl

Parallel (a logical vector of length one), Default: FALSE

pilot_ds_tb

Pilot dataset (a tibble), Default: NULL

priors_dbl

Priors (a double vector), Default: numeric(0)

priors_idx_1L_int

Priors index (an integer vector of length one), Default: integer(0)

seed_1L_int

Seed (an integer vector of length one), Default: 1987

session_ls

Session (a list), Default: list()

set_idx_1L_int

Set index (an integer vector of length one), Default: integer(0)

transform_att_nms_1L_lgl

Transform attribute names (a logical vector of length one), Default: T

Value

Discrete choice experiment design (a list)
